entries.name: Tom Pendergast
entries.og_textbox: I think Boss wouldn't like us talking about this new shipment so loudly...
entries.explanation: I think this 'Boss' character is someone worth keeping my eye out for. If we cut off the head of the snake, the body will soon die, I think.

entries.name: John Lazia
entries.og_textbox: I don't want to upset John...you know how he gets when a shipment goes wrong.
entries.explanation: John seems to be a key player in this operation, though whether just hired muscle or brains of operations is still up to be found.
